From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 Indian filmKartam BhugtamDirected bySoham P. ShahWritten bySoham P. ShahStarringMadhooShreyas TalpadeVijay RaazAksha PardasanyCinematographySantosh ThundiyilEdited byBiren Jyoti MohantyMusic byShabbir AhmedProductioncompanyGandhar Films & StudioRelease date17 May 2024CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Kartam Bhugtam is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language psychological thriller film, written and directed by Soham P. Shah. The film stars Shreyas Talpade and Vijay Raaz in the lead roles, while Madhoo and Aksha Pardasany play other pivotal roles. Produced by Gandhar Films & Studio, the film is set for a pan-India theatrical release on 17 May 2024 in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada and Malayalam languages.[1][2]


Synopsis[edit]
The film's title, “Kartam Bhugtam,” which translates to “what goes around, comes around,” not only encapsulates the essence of its narrative but also serves as a profound philosophical cornerstone. The story is woven around the immutable laws of karma and destiny, deeply rooted in the ancient wisdom of Vedic astrology. It is a cinematic exploration of the belief that every individual's actions—good, bad, or indifferent—inevitably shape their future. The film intricately portrays how the characters’ lives are intertwined with the cosmic dance of planetary influences, leading to a series of events that affirm the age-old Hindi adage, “Jaise karoge, waise bharoge” (Just as you sow, so shall you reap).[3]

Production[edit]
The announcement of “Kartam Bhugtam” was made by actor Shreyas Talpade on his Instagram,[4] expressing his excitement for his fourth release of the year. The film is currently in Post-production as of now.[5]

Release[edit]
“Kartam Bhugtam” is scheduled to hit theaters on May 17, 2024. The film will be released in multiple Indian languages, catering to a diverse audience across the country.[6]
